recipesJson.name: Gummy Bears On Pixy Stix
recipesJson.author: Fleming
recipesJson.description: The Apple Fuji, and Watermelon Clear are the base fruit flavors.  I used the Juicy Lemon and Lemonade Natural to tang it up and the sweet tart and jelly candy really work well together.  There the ones that give it that original, never had before, taste!!!  Co existing and making it taste like a gummy bear rolled in pixy stix dust.  I was absolutely floored when I first tried this.  Very Tasty.  My childhood treat.
